Justice for the Bypass kittens that were dropped out of a car on the Falmouth/Penryn bypass and killed on 23.8.13 We want the police to find and prosecute the guilty parties.
http://www.falmouthpacket.co.uk/news/10638650.Help_catch_these_vile_kitten_killers____500_reward_offered/?ref=rss&utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=facebook

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter.
